divs: sighting details sitting in our glass sunroom looking at moon on clear night of 8\25\12 at approx. 9:30 pm. first appeared evening of 8\24\12 in same area in sky & red glow. we thought it to be an airplane but as it disappeared in the sky, approx 10 min. later it appeared again from the same direction in the sky then disappeared again as before. it continued to appear & disappear two more times over a period of 20 min. or so. each time it was red in color & bright.
Summary: appearing in SE sky near Pacific Ocean & moon
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ocean Park
This sighting has never been favorited.
